boardgame.name: Vikings Gone Wild
boardgame.description: Each turn in Vikings Gone Wild _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; a deck-building, resource management game based on the online real-time strategy game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; players can either buy permanent buildings sitting in front of them (resource factories, resources containers, etc) or buy units, towers and special cards that improve their deck and offense/defense capacity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The only way to win is by successfully attacking each other, and each attack involves interesting bluffing mechanisms in which the attacker doesn't know the defense capacity of their opponent..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 28. Devon Dice Podcast part 2, Show packed full of content.
Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 020 – Reasons to Sell a Game
Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 037 – Top 10 Publishers
Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 038 – Jamaica vs Thunder Alley vs Race! Formula 90
Podcast #115 - Los problemas del primer mundo jugón

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

This Kickstarter set contains the base Vikings Gone Wild Game as well as the Guild Wars expansion, It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a Kind of Magic expansion, the 5th Viking expansion, and a Kickstarter exclusive expansion, plus the Sif Promo Card, all within the the special Ultimate box!
